##### <s class="topic-title">[[organizational notes]]</s>

In [[note writing]], notes that are used to organize other notes or information, i.e [[index note]], [[structural notes]], [[topic notes]]


**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
